wikipedia_page.main: Hector Richard Janse van Rensburg (born 27 October 1993), better known by his pseudonym Shitty Watercolour, is a British painter and cartoonist who started posting watercolour paintings on the social media website Reddit in February 2012, and later expanded to publishing his work on his own website, on Tumblr and on Twitter. He graduated from the University of York with a degree in philosophy, politics and economics.

response: * Hector Janse van Rensburg - watercolor painter, also known as Shitty Watercolour
